Package app.connectors

Class ConnectorClientToSensor

java.lang.Object
fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractConnector
app.connectors.ConnectorClientToSensor
All Implemented Interfaces:
fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.ConnectorI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.ComponentInterface, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.OfferedCI, fr.sorbonne_u.components.interfaces.RequiredCI, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.nodes.interfaces.RequestingCI, fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.nodes.interfaces.RequestingImplI, Remote
public class ConnectorClientToSensor extends fr.sorbonne_u.components.connectors.AbstractConnector implements fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.nodes.interfaces.RequestingCI
A connector class that facilitates communication between client components and sensor nodes in a sensor network. It implements the RequestingCI interface, allowing clients to send requests to sensors and retrieve data asynchronously or synchronously. This class extends AbstractConnector and provides the concrete implementation of executing requests either synchronously or asynchronously.

      public fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.QueryResultI execute(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.RequestI request) throws Exception
      Executes a request synchronously and returns the result. This method forwards the execution call to the connected sensor component which processes the request and returns the result.

      public void executeAsync(fr.sorbonne_u.cps.sensor_network.interfaces.RequestI request) throws Exception
